comment.author: 29634190@N08
comment._content: This is a drummer from "The President's Own" US Marine Band. It appears that the picture is taken on the parade deck of Marine Barracks, Washington, DC.  The white in the background looks like a wing of the Home of the Commandants and the window to the left looks like it belongs to one of the officers quarters buildings.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: usmcontra:  Thanks for the information about the US Marine Band and the possible location. We will update the source data and upload the description.

comment.author: 23748244@N06
comment._content: Dear god in heaven those dress reds look sharp

comment.author: 75495599@N06
comment._content: This gentleman is Charlie Owen, Marimba Soloist with the United States Marine Band and timpanist with the U.S. Marine Band and Orchestra under the direction of Colonel Taylor Branson and Col. William Santelmann from 1934–54.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you so much for this information David Valdes. We'll see about adding the name to the record the next time we update.
